util.linalg

Class DiagonalMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.linalg.Matrix
      • util.linalg.DiagonalMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Copyable

    public class DiagonalMatrix
extends Matrix
    A diagonal matrix is a matrix that only has a diagonal

    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
